1.1.5.name: wordpress/postie
1.1.5.description: Postie offers many advanced features for posting to your blog via e-mail, including the ability to assign categories by name, included pictures and videos, and automatically strip off signatures. It also has support for both imap and pop3, with the option for ssl with both. For usage notes, see the other notes page
